TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IGraphicsContext implements class System.IDisposable

Docs.summary: Provides methods for creating and interacting with an OpenGL context.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a System.Boolean, indicating whether automatic error checking should be performed.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Gets the GraphicsMode of this instance.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Gets a indicating whether this instance is current in the calling thread.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Gets a indicating whether this instance has been disposed. It is an error to access any instance methods if this property returns true.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void LoadAll() cil managed

Docs.summary: Loads all OpenGL entry points. Requires this instance to be current on the calling thread.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void MakeCurrent(class OpenTK.Platform.IWindowInfo window) cil managed

Docs.param: An OpenTK.Platform.IWindowInfo structure that points to a valid window.
Docs.summary: Makes the GraphicsContext current in the calling thread.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SwapBuffers() cil managed

Docs.summary: Swaps buffers, presenting the rendered scene to the user.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Update(class OpenTK.Platform.IWindowInfo window) cil managed

Docs.summary: Updates the graphics context. This must be called when the region the graphics context is drawn to is resized.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether VSyncing is enabled.
